headline: Valero Energy (NYSE:VLO) Reports Q1 Loss of US$595 Million as Sales Decline
summary: Valero Energy (NYSE:VLO) recently announced its first-quarter results for 2025, highlighting a downturn in both sales and net income, resulting in a net loss of $595 million. Despite this challenging performance, the stock price moved up by 6.88% last week. This increase occurred amidst a broader market rally, where major indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite rose significantly, spurred by optimism over earnings reports and tariff-related news. The company's disappointing earnings...

headline: Valero Energy's Q1 Earnings Miss on Lower Refining Margins
summary: VLO's first-quarter earnings and revenues decline year over year, primarily due to lower refining margins per barrel of throughput and asset impairments.

headline: Valero Energy: Q1 Earnings Snapshot
summary: SAN ANTONIO (AP) — Valero Energy Corp. VLO) on Thursday reported a loss of $595 million in its first quarter. The San Antonio-based company said it had a loss of $1.90 per share.

headline: Valero Energy Reports First Quarter 2025 Results
summary: SAN ANTONIO, April 24, 2025--Valero Energy Corporation (NYSE: VLO, "Valero") today reported a net loss attributable to Valero stockholders of $595 million, or $1.90 per share, for the first quarter of 2025, compared to net income of $1.2 billion, or $3.75 per share, for the first quarter of 2024. Excluding the pre-tax $1.1 billion, or $877 million after-tax, asset impairment loss related to the West Coast assets, adjusted net income attributable to Valero stockholders was $282 million, or $0.89
